articles.title: ATP Cup 2022. Poland - Argentina: match result and coverage - tennis
articles.description: The White-Reds already had Georgians and Greeks on the schedule. The stakes with Argentina were therefore high – a group win and a promotion to the semi-finals. articles.title: Poland beats Argentina to secure semifinal spot at ATP Cup
articles.description: Chile's 2-1 win over Norway meant Serbia needed to sweep Spain later Wednesday to move into top spot in Group A and advance to the semifinals.
articles.content: Hubert Hurkacz beat Diego Schwartzman 6-1, 6-4 to secure Poland’s victory over Argentina on Wednesday and a spot in the ATP Cup semifinals. Poland finished the round-robin stage 3-0 in Group D, with wins over Georgia, Greece and in the top-of-the-tab... [1122 chars]

articles.title: CBOT soybeans rally on Brazilian dryness
articles.description: CHICAGO, Jan 4 (Reuters) - Chicago Board of Trade soybean futures rallied on Tuesday, underpinned by hot, dry weather in Southern Brazil and Argentina that could cut yields, analysts said. * CBOT March soybeans gained 34-1/4 cents to $13.89-3/4 a bushel, after reaching $13.92-1/4, the highest for a most-active contract since July 21, 2021. * The most-active contract gained

articles.title: Argentinian woman strips in ice cream shop, uses dress as mask
articles.description: A woman in Argentina stripped down to her underwear and attempted to use her dress as a face covering to get around an ice cream parlor's mask mandate.
articles.content:
This ice cream lover has gelato chutzpah!
A woman in Argentina stripped down to her underwear and attempted to use her dress as a face covering to get around an ice cream parlor’s mask mandate, video shows.

articles.title: ATP Cup 2022: Stefanos Tsitsipas in pain but hopes to be fit for Australian Open
articles.description: The Greek star lost his first singles match since going under the knife in late November, losing to Argentina's world number 11 Diego Schwartzman 6-7 (5/7) 6-3, 6-3 on Monday night.

articles.title: Argentina reaffirms "legitimate sovereignty rights" over Malvinas
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES - Argentina on Monday reaffirmed its "legitimate sovereignty rights" over the Malvinas Islands, also known as the Falklands.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES – Argentina on Monday reaffirmed its “legitimate sovereignty rights” over the Malvinas Islands, also known as the Falklands.
